text: Kim Kyoung-soo (; born 1 December 1967) is a South Korean politician. He was a member of the National Assembly of South Korea from 2016 to 2018. He later was Governor of South Gyeongsang Province from 2018 to 2021. He was convicted and arrested for opinion rigging. He was an unsuccessful candidate for President of South Korea in the 2025 snap presidential election. ==References== Category:South Korean politicians Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean criminals
title: Kim Kyoung-soo
